Sramota! Zbirala denar za poroko, potem pa šok: Poroke ne bo, denar bom porabila!
Sorodniki so besni in zahtevajo, da podarjeni denar vrne.
06 Nov 2019, 11:20 by A. L.
Danes denar prek raznih spletnih aplikacij zbirajo za marsikaj, za pomoč pri zdravljenju, za financiranje novih produktov, nekateri pa tudi za poroko. Prav za veseli dogodek sta sredstva zbirala Pam in Edward. Na pomoč so jima priskočili tudi sorodniki in na računu se je hitro zbralo 30.000 dolarjev. Poroka bi se morala zgoditi 1. decembra, a je Pam kmalu prek spletnih omrežij sporočila, da je poroka po številnih burnih in solznih pogovorih z ožjo družino odložena za nedoločen čas. Hkrati se je zahvalila za vse donacije in pripisala, da ne bosta dovolila, da gre denar v nič, zato si bosta privoščila predporočne medene tedne. »Po medenih tednih bova objavila novi datum poroke in ponovno začela zbirati denar za darila. Poroke so drage,« je popolnoma brez slabe vesti in sramu napisala Pam.Nekatere, ki so prispevali denar, je Pamina predrznost razbesnila. Eden od sorodnikov je napisal: »Je to šala? Zbereš 30.000 dolarjev in se odločil, da boš pohlepen in zapravil vse zase?« Nekomu drugemu pa je resno prekipelo: »Na moje klice in sporočila se ne odzivaš, zato ti povem samo to: vrni našo zelo velikodušno donacijo, 12.000 dolarjev, v enem tednu. Če denarja do 13. novembra 2019 ne bo na mojem računu, se vidimo na sodišču. To je nesprejemljivo in gre za izdajo družine.«Eden, ki je iz svoje denarnice dal 100 dolarjev, piše tudi: »Se ti je zmešalo? Boš rekla 'hasta la vista' družini in prijateljem?« Ne glede na vse je Pam neomajna in meni, da je podarjeni denar zdaj kar njen. Pri tem ji je ena od nesojenih družic celo stopila v bran in v Paminem imenu razkačene darovalce prosila za malo sočutja. Dodala je še, da je sama dala 200 dolarjev, toliko, kolikor si je lahko privoščila.Po burnih odzivih se je nesojena nevesta vnovič oglasila in priznala, da je zaradi vsega tega morala k zdravniku. Ker ne razume, zakaj so ljudje tako jezni nanjo, je baje podvomila celo o svojem duševnem zdravju. Ker pa obisk zdravnika seveda ni zastonj, je morala reva že načeti tako težko nabrani denar. Vsem zdaj predlaga, naj ne skušajo priti v stik z njo, ker si mora najprej opomoči, verjetno v kakšnih toplicah ali, kot se temu reče dandanašnji, v centru za zdravje in dobro počutje.

Shame! Raising money for a wedding, then the shock: There will be no marriage, I will spend the money!
Relatives are furious and demand that the donated money be returned.
06 Nov 2019, 11:20 by A.L.
Today, through various online applications, they raise money for many things, to help with healing, to fund new products, and some to get married. It was for a joyous event that Pam and Edward raised funds. They were also helped by relatives and quickly raised $ 30,000. The wedding was due to take place on December 1, but Pam soon announced via online networks that the wedding was postponed indefinitely after numerous tumultuous and tearful discussions with her immediate family. At the same time, she thanked for all the donations and attributed that they would not allow the money to go to nothing, so they would afford a honeymoon. “After the honeymoon, we will announce a new wedding date and start raising money for gifts again. Weddings are expensive, "Pam wrote completely unhappy and ashamed. Some of the contributors made Pam's insolence enraged. One of the relatives wrote: "Is this a joke? You raise $ 30,000 and decide to be greedy and waste it all on your own? ”To someone else, it was gravely rumbling,“ You do not respond to my calls and messages, so let me tell you just this: return our very generous donation, $ 12,000, in one week. If the money is not in my account by November 13, 2019, I'll see you in court. This is unacceptable and is a betrayal of the family. "One who gave $ 100 from his wallet also writes," Are you kidding? Will you say 'hasta la vista' to family and friends? ”Regardless, Pam is adamant and thinks the donated money is now hers. In doing so, one of the unsuspecting bridesmaids even came to her defense and asked Pam's donated donors for some sympathy. She added that she gave herself $ 200 as much as she could afford.After the violent response, the unmarried bride made another call and admitted that she had to go to the doctor because of all this. Because she does not understand why people are so angry with her, she doubted even her mental health. However, since the visit to the doctor was not free, of course, the roar had to start raising so much money. She now suggests that everyone should not try to get in touch with her because she must first recover, probably in some spa or, as this is called today, at a health and wellness center.
